snippet: When asked by the German magazine Der Spiegel what happens after a computer user becomes the focus of N.S.A. surveillance, Edward J. Snowden said, “They’re just owned.”
abstract: When asked by the German magazine Der Spiegel what happens after a computer user becomes the focus of N.S.A. surveillance, Edward J. Snowden said, “They’re just owned.”

headline.main: Der Spiegel Publishes Portion of Snowden Vetting Interview
